sense.def:
To scrub something
pomeni nekaj močno drgniti s krtačo in vodo, da bi tisto očistili.

seg.quote: They scrub the kitchen floor every day.
He scrubbed his hands at the sink.
That floor needs a good scrub.

sense.def:
To scrub dirt off something
pomeni odstraniti umazanijo z nečesa z močnim drgnjenjem.

seg.quote: There was a stain on the collar and he tried to scrub it off.

sense.def:
Scrub
so nizka drevesa in grmovje na območju, kjer pade zelo malo dežja.

seg.quote: The country is flat, grassy, and covered in scrub.
